product_name: Brooks Infiniti Support A/B Tank Top - Women's
long_description: With a flattering fit, smart design and even smarter fabric, the Brooks Infiniti Support Tank Top II for A/B cups uses a built-in sports bra to add high-impact support during your run. Lightweight fabric offers a soft touch, wicks moisture, dries quickly and resists odors. Strategically placed mesh panels enhance ventilation. Breathable, padded cups offer shaped encapsulation and high-impact support with an extra layer of lining for modesty. Front and back reflective highlights increase visibility in low light. The women's Brooks Infiniti Support Tank Top II for A/B cups offers a next-to-body fit.
short_description: With a flattering fit, smart design and even smarter fabric, the Brooks Infiniti Support Tank Top II for A/B cups uses a built-in sports bra to add high-impact support during your run.
